caption:
The photograph showcases an industrial scene primarily dominated by elements of power transmission. In the foreground, there is a large informational sign which reads "GLEN CANYON-FLAGSTAFF TRANSMISSION LINE NO 1 345 kV" and "BUREAU OF RECLAMATION". The sign is black with white text, featuring a stylized white lightning bolt. Positioned prominently at the upper part of the scene is a large electrical transmission tower. The tower is metallic and constructed in a lattice style, typical for high voltage power lines. Its structure forms an A-shape with cross bars supporting numerous insulators and power lines stretching outward and upward into the scene.

The background displays a partly cloudy sky with soft blue hues and fluffy, light gray clouds scattered across it. Below the sky, the landscape consists of arid terrain with some green vegetation, suggesting a desert or semi-arid zone. No human figures or animals are visible in the image, emphasizing the industrial and uninhabited nature of the location. The entire composition conveys a sense of isolation and the scale of the infrastructure related to power transmission in remote areas.
title: Power lines
